verses.verse: (A Psalm of the sons of Korah. A Song.) His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains. <S%H2022><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> More <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the [other] dwelling <S%H4908><s%> places <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob. <S%H3290><s%>
Glorious <S%H3513><s%> things <S%H3513><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> of you, O city <S%H5892><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

"I shall mention <S%H2142><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> among those who know <S%H3045><s%> Me; Behold, <S%H2009><s%> Philistia <S%H6429><s%> and Tyre <S%H6865><s%> with Ethiopia: <S%H3568><s%> 'This <S%H2088><s%> one <S%H2088><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>'"

But of Zion <S%H6726><s%> it shall be said, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> and that one <S%H376><s%> were born <S%H3205><s%> in her"; And the Most <S%H9411><s%> High <S%H9411><s%> Himself <S%H1931><s%> will establish <S%H3559><s%> her.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall count <S%H5608><s%> when He registers <S%H3789><s%> the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> one <S%H2088><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>" Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Then those who sing <S%H7891><s%> as well as those who play <S%H9136><s%> the flutes <S%H9136><s%> [shall say], "All <S%H3605><s%> my springs <S%H4599><s%> [of joy] are in you."
